message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to get a head start on the market, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. What do you say? Will you take the plunge and buy it?
I trust your expertise and am willing to take the risk. Let's make this purchase!

However, I've had some positive feedback from a few beta testers who said it's still a decent product. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $1000000. Are you willing to take another chance and give it a try?
